title: Cigar Slang with Justo Eiroa of JRE Tobacco / Aladino
itunes:title: Cigar Slang with Justo Eiroa of JRE Tobacco / Aladino
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire... There is Slang that cigar people know, that the average person has no idea what it means. There may even be some Cigar Slang that we don’t even know – but our guest knows it all! From JRE Cigars – makers of Aladino, Justo Eiroa joins us today as we talk Cigar Slang.

In the first hour we will light up a cigar from the Care Package it's the Aladino Cameroon Robusto. While in the second hour we will light up something made by Justo Eiroa for United Cigars; Abuelo.

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Ask the Don, the Email of the Week and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.
